pull.title: [Qt] coin-control features GUI cleanup 2 and 3
pull.body:
- remove monospace labels from sendcoinsdialog also
- use a validated line edit for the change address
- add a tooltip to change address switch
- ensure we have a valid change address in CoinControlDialog::coinControl->destChange or just CNoDestination()
- some small ui file changes
- remove style sheets from ui files and use Qt attributes instead
- make some more strings untranslatable, to make life for translators easier
- split up long tooltips and rework the texts a little

events.body:
I have more string and translations updates, but don't want to bloat this pull, so it get's merged faster.
@laanwj Can you take a look please?
@laanwj Same here, I have more to come for coin control, but would love to see this merged first...

@diapolo Code changes are OK, if you want to continue along these lines you could create a pull request that depends on this one 
(I did the same with #3332 and #3320)

events.message:
[Qt] coin-control features GUI cleanup 2

- remove monospace labels from sendcoinsdialog also
- use a validated line edit for the change address
- add a tooltip to change address switch
- ensure we have a valid change address in
  CoinControlDialog::coinControl->destChange or just CNoDestination()
- some small ui file changes

[Qt] coin-control features GUI cleanup 3

- remove style sheets from ui files and use Qt attributes instead
- make some more strings untranslatable, to make life for translators
  easier
- split up long tooltips an rework the texts a little

events.body: @laanwj As it were mostly text and ui file changes I added a new commit to this pull instead.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/d3207b6fa8283cdd15bfa89b222880cf20524c35 for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.
